A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bold step forward for the Star Wars universe. Unlike any Star Wars movie\, but totally feels at home in the saga. Characters take center stage over flashy CG set pieces and battles. Mark Hamill is a master in his role and Carrie Fisher leaves us with a fitting memory of her and her beloved Leia. So many unexpected twists and turns. A thrill ride with heart. I can totally see why he was given his own trilogy.
